CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection rejected (estoppel);Violation of P1-1;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant is the owner of an apartment in GPE , which she had let to GPE
CARDINAL . In a registered letter of CARDINAL DATE , the applicant informed the tenant that she intended to terminate the lease expiring on DATE and asked her to vacate the LOC by DATE .
CARDINAL . In a writ served on the tenant on DATE , the applicant reiterated her intention to terminate the lease and summoned the tenant to appear before ORG .
CARDINAL . By a decision of CARDINAL DATE , which was made enforceable on DATE , ORG upheld the validity of the notice to quit and ordered that the premises be vacated by DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant served notice on the tenant requiring her to vacate the premises .
CARDINAL . On DATE , she served notice on the tenant informing her that the order for possession would be enforced by a bailiff on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant made a statutory declaration that she urgently required the premises as accommodation for herself .
CARDINAL . DATE and DATE the bailiff made CARDINAL attempts to recover possession .
CARDINAL . Each attempt proved unsuccessful , as the applicant was never granted the assistance of the police in enforcing the order for possession .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was granted police assistance in evicting her tenant ; on DATE , however , the latter claimed to be ill and no officially appointed doctor was available to check her allegations . The bailiff arranged to make his next visit to the premises on DATE . However , on that occasion the applicant was not granted police assistance and the tenant refused to vacate the LOC , as she was about to have a council flat allocated to her . On DATE , the tenant produced a document from the council stating that she would have the flat from DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the tenant vacated the premises .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is described in the judgment ORG GPE [ ORG ] , no . CARDINAL , CARDINAL , § § DATE , ECHR CARDINAL-V , to be published .
